mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gas_station (GS_ID, X_COORD, Y_COORD, BRAND_CODE, STATION_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{gsId}, #{xCoord}, #{yCoord}, #{brandCode}, #{stationName}, #{address}, #{phone}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE X_COORD = VALUES(X_COORD), Y_COORD = VALUES(Y_COORD), BRAND_CODE = VALUES(BRAND_CODE), STATION_NAME = VALUES(STATION_NAME), ADDRESS = VALUES(ADDRESS), PHONE = VALUES(PHONE), UPDATED_AT = NOW();
